ARABIC: قَالُوا۟ سَنُرَٰوِدُ عَنْهُ أَبَاهُ وَإِنَّا لَفَٰعِلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'We will request our father for him. That is something we will surely do.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They said: "We shall request his father, and will certainly do that."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They said: "We will surely try to prevail over our father to send him. Be sure we shall do so."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Joseph's brothers said, "We shall try to influence his father to send him with us and we shall be successful".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “We will seek him from his father – this we must surely do.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "We shall try to get permission (for him) from his father, and verily, we shall do it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: We will strive to make his father yield in respect of him, and we are sure to do (it).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'We will solicit him of our father; that we will do.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: We will try to win him from his father: that we will surely do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They replied, "We shall try to persuade his father to send him with us. We shall do [our utmost]!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: we will surely entice away his father from him; and verily we are doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘We will solicit him from his father. [That] we will surely do.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said: "We shall certainly seek to get our wish about him from his father: Indeed we shall do it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They said: "We shall try to get permission (for him) from his father, and verily, we shall do it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They replied: 'We will ask our father for him. This we will surely do'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “We will solicit him from his father. We will surely do.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "We will attempt to dissuade his father from [keeping] him, and indeed, we will do [it]."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [12:61] They said, ‘We will try to tempt his father away from him, that is, we will try our hardest to seek him from him. That we will surely do’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said: We will try to win him from his father) we will ask his father and try to entice his father to let him come with us: (that we will surely do) we surely guarantee that we will bring him with us.
